Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control implements the functionality of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control with the visual appearance of a button.
In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinkButtonDesigner> class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.
